title: Citi Disappointed by Decision to Withdraw from Paris Agreement
summary: We were outspoken in our support for the U.S. to remain in the Paris Climate Agreement and are disappointed President Trump chose to leave the pact. We remain very focused on our own efforts to protect the environment, most notably our commitment to finance $100 billion in clean energy, infrastructure and technology projects which will help build a more sustainable economy.
